alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 12 at 5:34AM MDT until June 14 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT /11 AM PDT/ TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall from thunderstorms is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Idaho and northeast Oregon, including the following areas, in Idaho, Boise Mountains, Camas Prairie, Upper Weiser River and West Central Mountains. In northeast Oregon, Baker County. * WHEN...From Noon MDT /11 AM PDT/ today through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff, including mudslides, may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A strong upper level trough will move into the area today, promoting the development of strong thunderstorms with heavy rain. Thunderstorms will be capable of torrential rainfall, small hail, and gusty winds. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; West Central Mountains
